name: AKB48's Dobon!
summary:
Let's have fun with AKB48 members in online play！
A Dobon is that you can enjoy with CPU match and online match!
AKB48 members also participate in the online multiplayer match!
Good luck players matched with AKB48 members can play directly.

Let's get along well with AKB48 members!
Set your favorite AKB48 members, play a Dobon and the cards grow and the closeness with AKB members will be improved!
When closeness rises, application limited "secret voice" is released.

A Dobon that anyone can easily play!
Even a beginner can play easily with a guide.
